title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Collaborative Learning-Based Scientific Inquiry Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design science inquiry projects by applying differentiated cooperative learning strategies based on grade levels
Learners can determine optimal group configurations (3–5 members) and assign roles in online/offline environments
Learners can develop a feedback mechanism through peer assessment that improves the efficiency and satisfaction of group work by over 80%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
